itunes:title: Episode 381 - Special Guest Jack Carr
title: Episode 381 - Special Guest Jack Carr
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Evan Hafer and Jarred Taylor sit down with special guest Jack Carr. Jack Carr is a former Navy SEAL who led special operations teams as a Team Leader, Platoon Commander, Troop Commander, and Task Unit Commander. Over his twenty years in Naval Special War...
itunes:summary:
Evan Hafer and Jarred Taylor sit down with special guest Jack Carr. Jack Carr is a former Navy SEAL who led special operations teams as a Team Leader, Platoon Commander, Troop Commander, and Task Unit Commander. Over his twenty years in Naval Special Warfare he transitioned from an enlisted SEAL sniper to a junior officer leading assault and sniper teams in Iraq and Afghanistan, to a platoon commander practicing counterinsurgency in the southern Philippines, to commanding a Special Operations Task Unit in the most Iranian influenced section of southern Iraq throughout the tumultuous drawdown of US Forces. Jack retired from active duty in 2016 and lives with his wife and three children in Park City, Utah. He is the author of The Terminal List and True Believer. Visit him at OfficialJackCarr.com and follow along on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook at @JackCarrUSA.

Drinkin' Bros Merch at drinkinbros.com
